channel.title: Ultraviolet Grasslands: In the Shadow of the Near Moon
channel.description:
![EarwF_VU4AAE1L-|402x500](upload://cDwjMq2jVMPrxoFTxuhMTn0hrqC.jpeg) “It’s the end of the world as we know it, and it’s only just begun”— *Armageddon* , Gamma Ray
Ultraviolet Grasslands is a psychedelic metal setting by Luka Rejec about exploration, survival, drugs and resource management. This is a continuation of the adventures of the Cogflower Caravan on her journey to the Black City. New and returning players are equally welcome. We will be using Whitehack, a rules lite version of the world's most popular RPG. This event is scheduled to run for 3.5 hours. It will be recorded assuming all parties agree. There will be 3 sessions in August. Being able to attend each session is ideal but not required. You must RSVP to each session you wish to attend.
This game will follow the Gauntlet Community Code of Conduct: https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/community-code-of-conduct.html. We will be using [the X-Card](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1SB0jsx34bWHZWbnNIVVuMjhDkrdFGo1_hSC2BWPlI3A/edit) and other safety tools players suggest. [date=2020-08-01 time=18:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="Europe/Amsterdam"] → [date=2020-08-01 time=21:30:00 format="LLLL" timezone="Europe/Amsterdam"] https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MCIaPYDJXjVBUTum3Zj [date=2020-08-08 time=18:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="Europe/Amsterdam"] → [date=2020-08-08 time=21:30:00 format="LLLL" timezone="Europe/Amsterdam"]https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MCIakeV_uqfa3LPD9D- [date=2020-08-22 time=18:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="Europe/Amsterdam"] → [date=2020-08-22 time=21:30:00 format="LLLL" timezone="Europe/Amsterdam"]https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MCIb10Gc4-cD5QkKMf2

item.description:
@HorstWurst wrote:

EarwF_VU4AAE1L-1080×1340 394 KB

“It’s the end of the world as we know it, and it’s only just begun”— Armageddon , Gamma Ray

Ultraviolet Grasslands is a psychedelic metal setting by Luka Rejec about exploration, survival, drugs and resource management.
This is a continuation of the adventures of the Cogflower Caravan on her journey to the Black City. New and returning players are equally welcome.
We will be using Whitehack, a rules lite version of the world’s most popular RPG.
This event is scheduled to run for 3.5 hours. It will be recorded assuming all parties agree.
There will be 3 sessions in August. Being able to attend each session is ideal but not required. You must RSVP to each session you wish to attend.

This game will follow the Gauntlet Community Code of Conduct: https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/community-code-of-conduct.html. We will be using the X-Card and other safety tools players suggest.
